title: Northern Territory Contact. No. 08
creator_credit: Film Australia, Malcolm Otton and Ian Walker
brief_description: Beulah Lowe is a dedicated teacher, helping Aboriginal children at Milingimbi to learn Gupapuyngu, their own language, in the bi-lingual educational program adopted in some Territory schools.
